description: Detects suspicious outbound network activity via kerberos default port indicating possible lateral movement or first stage PrivEsc via delegation. Author: Ilyas Ochkov, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Outbound Kerberos Connection
query: ((destination.port:"88" AND winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true") AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\lsass.exe OR *\\opera.exe OR *\\chrome.exe OR *\\firefox.exe OR *\\tomcat\\bin\\tomcat8.exe))))
